nodes.text: Falsta was a Human male who worked as a assassin and smuggler for Black Sun and Jabba the Hutt. He was killed by Han Solo in 0 ABY on the planet Wukkar when he tried to take Han Solo in.

Falsta was short and scrawny and wore a leather jacket typically over a flame-bird shirt. He carried a heavily modified Clone Wars-era DT-57 heavy blaster pistol which he claimed was once owned by General Grievous. No one appeared to believe this claim.
